alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 04 at 10:21PM EST until January 05 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Ice accumulations of up three tenths of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern New York. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Isolated power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be nearly impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northeast wind gusts over Massena, New York could approach 35 mph. In combination with freezing rain, this may produce more ice accumulation on elevated surfaces, tree limbs, and utility lines.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Please allow extra time if travel is necessary.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clinton; Northern Franklin; Northern St. Lawrence; Southern Franklin; Southwestern St. Lawrence; Western Clinton; Western Essex
